column1: în is a Sindarin word appearing the Kings Letter.
column2: p. 129 The word is commonly understood to be a pronoun meaning "his" (referring to the subject).
column4: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 20 July 2011)

column1:
Ar e aníra ennas suilannad mhellyn în phain

==Noldorin==
în is a Noldorin word meaning year".
